20101203172027.000|20101203172027.833|CCO|    had a heart attack caused by
20101203172027.833|20101203172028.667|CCO|
20101203172028.667|20101203172029.500|CCO|    a completely blocked artery,
20101203172029.500|20101203172030.333|CCO|  another heart attack could be
20101203172030.333|20101203172031.167|CCO|
20101203172031.167|20101203172032.000|CCO|    lurking, waiting to strike.
20101203172032.000|20101203172032.667|CCO|        
20101203172032.667|20101203172033.333|CCO|          A heart attack
20101203172033.333|20101203172034.000|CCO|    
20101203172034.000|20101203172034.667|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,
20101203172034.667|20101203172035.333|CCO|    
20101203172035.333|20101203172036.000|CCO|    one that could be fatal.
20101203172036.000|20101203172036.667|CCO|    But PLAVIX helps save lives.
20101203172036.667|20101203172037.333|CCO|    
20101203172037.333|20101203172038.000|CCO|          PLAVIX, taken with
20101203172038.000|20101203172038.667|CCO|    
20101203172038.667|20101203172039.333|CCO|      other heart medicines,
20101203172039.333|20101203172040.000|CCO|    
20101203172040.000|20101203172040.667|CCO|      goes beyond what other
20101203172040.667|20101203172041.333|CCO|
20101203172041.333|20101203172042.000|CCO|      heart medicines do alone,
20101203172042.000|20101203172042.588|CCO|  to provide greater protection
20101203172042.588|20101203172043.176|CCO|    
20101203172043.176|20101203172043.765|CCO|        against heart attack
20101203172043.765|20101203172044.353|CCO|    
20101203172044.353|20101203172044.941|CCO|    or stroke and even death
20101203172044.941|20101203172045.529|CCO|        
20101203172045.529|20101203172046.118|CCO|              by helping
20101203172046.118|20101203172046.706|CCO|    
20101203172046.706|20101203172047.294|CCO|    to keep blood platelets
20101203172047.294|20101203172047.882|CCO|    
20101203172047.882|20101203172048.471|CCO|      from sticking together
20101203172048.471|20101203172049.059|CCO|
20101203172049.059|20101203172049.647|CCO|    and forming dangerous clots.
20101203172049.647|20101203172050.235|CCO|        
20101203172050.235|20101203172050.824|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101203172050.824|20101203172051.412|CCO|
20101203172051.412|20101203172052.000|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101203172052.000|20101203172052.714|CCO|    
20101203172052.714|20101203172053.429|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101203172053.429|20101203172054.143|CCO|        
20101203172054.143|20101203172054.857|CCO|            save lives.
20101203172054.857|20101203172055.571|CCO|    
20101203172055.571|20101203172056.286|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101203172056.286|20101203172057.000|CCO|    
20101203172057.000|20101203172057.714|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101203172057.714|20101203172058.429|CCO|    
20101203172058.429|20101203172059.143|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101203172059.143|20101203172059.857|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101203172059.857|20101203172100.571|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101203172100.571|20101203172101.286|CCO|
20101203172101.286|20101203172102.000|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.

20101203172110.125|20101203172110.750|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101203172110.750|20101203172111.375|CCO|

20101203172112.000|20101203172112.556|CCO|
